LEGACYOFAT is a simple, short, yet enjoyable experience, but a few things might need some explaining...
HOW TO NAVIGATE THE UI
To see more of this main screen simply drag the screen up and down
To get to different pages in the menu simply click the buttons below
In the ROSTER menu you can see 4 boxes at the top and two arrow buttons, this is the team selection and assignment section By clicking on the arrows you can change the current team, and by clicking on a slot in the team and then some other slot in either the team or the roster the character will change The boxes below are your characters, you will only start with one character but you can acquire more by rolling them via the GACHA menu Clicking on a character and then on a team slot will assign the character to the team slot DOUBLE CLICKING on a CHARACTER will allow you to see details of the character such as its stats and items...
In the character detail menu (accessed by double clicking a character in the roster menu) you can see a big image of your character and its stats The 3 boxes with red Xs on them are the character item slots, ARMOR, WEAPON and TRINKET in descending order By clicking on an item slot you will be taken to your inventory screen, here you can check your items and assign them to the character If you clicked on the first slot (armor) and then click on an item which is an armor and click select your character will now wear the item Items can be acquired from the SHOP menu or the GACHA menu
In the BATTLE menu you will see a list of battles you can partake in Each battle has a name and 4 slots next to the name which represent what enemies are in that stage If the name is red it means you havent cleared the battle yet, a green name means you have cleared it already You can clear a stage as many times as you want
In the GACHA menu you can try your chance and spend JIMS to roll for new items and characters Better characters have lower chances of appearing and you will most likely get a lot of duplicate items in your journey JIMS can be earned from battles, same with GOLD
In the BLACKSMITH menu you can either view your inventory or view the SHOP In shop you can buy new items with the gold youve earned
Pressing the BACK button on your device will bring you back to this screen
HOW TO BATTLE
Combat in LEGACYOFAT is turn based Your team and the enemy team is laid out on a 2x2 grid, with your team on the left and enemy team on the right To advance a turn simply press the center which has the battle information text in it Before advancing a turn you might want to change the action your character does this turn Clicking on a character in the bottom 4 slots bar will list you with the characters actions Clicking on an action will tell you what the action does in the battle information text box Double clicking on an action will select that action and switch back to the team slot bar Some actions have cooldowns which mean they cant be used every turn Some actions can stun your or enemy characters which means they cant act for the turn The battle is won or lost depending on which teams characters last the longest You can bail out of a battle by pressing the BACK button on your device, but you will lose all progress
BEGINNER TIPS
You start with 100 JIMS and 1000 GOLD, go spend them and equip your team and start battling! "
